element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm extends the attributes table of a points layer, adding new fields that contain the values of a given set of raster layers at those points

element.name: GRIDS
element.text: The set of input raster layers. For each of them, a new field will be added to the attributes table of the points layer

element.name: INTERPOLATE
element.text: If this option is selected, b-spline interpolation is used to calculate values when points do not fall exactly on the center of a pixel. If not, the value of the nearest pixel is used.
